AND CATE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND ACCUSER '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND ACCUSED LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND REPORT_TYPE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
